item.title: 尽管通胀取得进展，巴西央行仍支持高利率
item.description: 巴西央行表示，它将开启货币政策的新阶段，选择在很长一段时间内维持利率不变，同时评估该计划是否足以使通胀率达到目标。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it’s starting a new stage in monetary policy by opting to keep interest rates unchanged for a very long period while it evaluates if that plan will be enough to bring inflation to the target.】

item.title: KKR 将以 100 亿美元收购 Sempra 基础设施部门的股份
item.description: Sempra 同意以 100 亿美元的价格将其基础设施部门 45% 的股权出售给 KKR 和加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）的关联公司，这笔交易将提高其受监管公用事业收入的比例。【原文：Sempra agreed to sell a 45% equity stake in its infrastructure arm to affiliates of KKR and Canada Pension Plan Investment Board for $10 billion, a deal that will boost the percentage of its earnings from regulated utilities.】

item.title: 普林斯顿网络内幕 助推加密货币财政繁荣
item.description: 包括银河数字公司（Galaxy Digital）的迈克-诺沃格拉茨（Mike Novogratz）和黑豹资本公司（Pantera Capital）的丹-莫黑德（Dan Morehead）在内的加密货币大腕们不断出现在一桩又一桩交易中，形成了加密货币新时代最大胆的赌注之一：数字资产财政繁荣。【原文：A tight circle of crypto power players — including Galaxy Digital’s Mike Novogratz and Pantera Capital’s Dan Morehead — keeps turning up in deal after deal, shaping one of the boldest bets in crypto’s new era: the digital-asset treasury boom.】

item.title: Klarna和Netskope的首次公开募股创造了2021年以来美国上市交易量最高的一个月
item.description: 美国首次公开募股（IPO）市场正在经历自 2021 年最后一轮躁动以来最繁忙的一个月。【原文：A burst of activity is powering the US IPO market toward its busiest month since the final innings of a manic 2021.】

item.title: 匈牙利在新通胀预测前维持关键利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利央行连续第 12 个月维持借贷成本不变，此前货币反弹未能动摇决策者降低欧盟最高关键利率之一的决心。【原文：Hungary’s central bank left borrowing costs unchanged for a 12th month after a currency rally failed to sway policymakers to bring down one of the highest key interest rates in the European Union.】

item.title: 穆迪称私募股权投资依赖较弱的信用保障措施
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的一份报告显示，由于私募股权支持的借款人正在推动风险较高、违约时回报较少的贷款激增，具有强大财务保障的贷款已在信贷市场上基本消失。【原文：Loans with strong financial safeguards have largely disappeared from credit markets as borrowers backed by private equity are driving a surge of riskier loans that return less money in a default, according to a Moody’s Ratings report.】

item.title: 加拿大希望特朗普的 10 万美元签证费能将人才重新引向北方
item.description: 多年来，加拿大的技术和医疗保健等高技能行业一直面临着人才向美国流失的问题。一些高管认为，唐纳德-特朗普总统提高 H-1B 签证费用的举措将改变这一态势。【原文：For years, Canada’s highly-skilled industries such as technology and health care have suffered a brain drain to the US. Some executives believe President Donald Trump’s move to make H-1B visas more expensive will change the dynamic.】

item.title: 不断攀升的电力成本已成为美国的主要政治问题
item.description:
在过去一年中，电价的涨幅是通货膨胀率的两倍多。【原文：

Electricity prices increased by more than double the rate of inflation this past year.

】

item.title: 几内亚支持将总统任期延长至七年的新法律
item.description: 几内亚选民以压倒性多数支持新宪法，新宪法将总统任期延长一年至七年，并允许军方领导人马马迪-敦布亚（Mamadi Doumbouya）将军今后参选。【原文：Guinean voters overwhelming backed a new constitution that extends presidential terms by one year to seven and allows military leader General Mamadi Doumbouya to stand for election in the future.】

item.title: 美光需要美好前景来证明其股价飙升的合理性
item.description: 周二收盘后，美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc.’s earnings after the bell Tuesday will shed light on whether the chipmaker’s high-flying stock has gotten ahead of itself after a nearly 40% gain in September.】

item.title: 英格兰银行和经合组织就英国通胀乏力发出警告
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，英国经济的结构性变化可能会使通胀持续走高，而经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）警告称，英国将成为七国集团中物价增长最快的国家。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said that structural changes in the UK economy may be keeping inflation elevated, as the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development warned Britain will suffer the fastest price growth in the Group of Seven.】

item.title: 金色通道再出口液化天然气项目获美国批准，启动在即
item.description: Golden Pass LNG Terminal LLC 已获准从该设施再出口液化天然气，该设施正准备于今年年底投产。【原文：Golden Pass LNG Terminal LLC has been granted permission to re-export LNG from the facility as the facility prepares for start-up at the end of this year.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 的销售热潮未能缓解游戏开发者的忧虑情绪
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Takashi Mochizuki 报道了任天堂 Switch 2 游戏机受到消费者热捧，但独立游戏厂商销售低迷的情况。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Takashi Mochizuki reports on the sluggish sales for independent game makers despite consumer enthusiasm for Nintendo’s Switch 2 console.】

item.title: 中国为受特朗普关税冲击的出口产品寻找其他市场
item.description: 在美国开征高额关税的五个月里，习近平主席的出口引擎势不可挡，使中国的贸易顺差超过 1.2 万亿美元，创历史新高。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s export engine has proved unstoppable during five months of sky-high US tariffs, sending China toward a record trade surplus exceeding $1.2 trillion.】

item.title: 风险投资公司致人工智能初创企业：请收下我们的钱
item.description:
私人飞机、包厢座位和大额支票。投资者不惜一切代价进入顶级人工智能交易。【原文：

Private jets, box seats and big checks. Investors are doing whatever it takes to get into top AI deals.

】

item.title: 苹果公司的 iPhone 17 产品线因重新关注硬件而获胜
item.description:
全新的设计、超薄的手机和升级的摄像头让苹果智能技术退居其次。【原文：

Apple Intelligence takes a backseat to fresh designs, a very thin phone and upgraded cameras.

】

item.title: 美国关税收入激增显而易见，官员们对谁来买单意见不一
item.description: 我是洛杉矶的经济编辑劳拉-柯蒂斯。今天我们将探讨美国关税支付膨胀的出处。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Laura Curtis, an economics editor in Los Angeles. Today we’re looking at the provenance of the swelling US tariff payments. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司以小博大的地区增长计划
item.description: 拉美航空首席执行官罗伯托-阿尔沃（Roberto Alvo）表示，拉美最大的航空公司正在通过小规模扩张，在该地区目前航线较少的二三线城市寻求增长。【原文：Latin America’s largest airline is expanding by going small, looking for growth in those second or third-tier cities in the region that are currently poorly served, said Latam Airlines Chief Executive Officer Roberto Alvo.】

item.title: 玻利维亚帕斯誓言恢复与美国的关系，确保燃料供应
item.description: 玻利维亚中间派总统候选人罗德里戈-帕斯（Rodrigo Paz）承诺，在即将卸任的社会主义者统治下，玻利维亚与美国的关系紧张了近二十年，如果他在下个月的第二轮投票中获胜，他将恢复与美国的关系，这表明玻利维亚的政策将发生重大转变。【原文：Bolivia’s centrist presidential hopeful Rodrigo Paz pledged to restore ties with the US after nearly two decades of strained relations under the outgoing socialists, signaling a major policy shift if he wins next month’s second-round vote.】

item.title: 佩雷拉称欧洲央行应在利率问题上保持 "操作空间
item.description: 即将上任的欧洲中央银行理事会成员阿尔瓦罗-桑托斯-佩雷拉（Alvaro Santos Pereira）表示，欧洲中央银行的通货膨胀已得到控制，未来应在利率方面保持行动空间。【原文：The European Central Bank has inflation is under control and should maintain space to act in the future on interest rates, according to incoming Governing Council member Alvaro Santos Pereira.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦寻求石油以外的经济增长，并依靠中国来实现这一目标
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦主管经济的副总理表示，哈萨克斯坦正在努力摆脱石油依赖，依靠中国并投入数百亿美元支持经济增长。【原文：Kazakhstan is pushing ahead with efforts to wean itself off oil, leaning on China and plowing tens of billions of dollars into supporting growth, according to the deputy premier overseeing the economy.】

item.title: 中国贸易商在米莱出口税减免后预订阿根廷大豆
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国的贸易公司本周罕见地抢购了 10 批阿根廷大豆，这增加了中国对南美供应的依赖，因为中国避开了美国作物。【原文：China-based trading firms snapped up 10 cargoes of Argentine soybeans in a rare buying spree this week, adding to the nation’s reliance on South American supply as it avoids US crops, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 关注鲍威尔，美债迎来五天来首次上涨
item.description: 由于交易员预计美联储的一系列发言人可能会发出更多降息信号，国债在五个交易日中首次上涨。【原文：Treasuries headed for their first day of gains in five sessions as traders anticipated a slew of Federal Reserve speakers may signal more interest-rate cuts are coming.】

item.title: 肯尼亚首席执行官称，肯尼亚尚未就分拆公司事宜与 Safaricom 董事会接触
item.description: 肯尼亚 Safaricom Plc 首席执行官 Peter Ndegwa 表示，肯尼亚政府尚未与 Safaricom Plc 董事会商讨将其最大公司拆分为三家独立公司的潜在计划。【原文：Kenya’s government is yet to engage the board of Safaricom Plc about a potential plan to split its biggest company into three separate firms, according to Chief Executive Officer Peter Ndegwa.】

item.title: 英国央行皮尔称其拥有更快削减量化宽松债券的工具
item.description: 英格兰银行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，央行应更快地缩减其在量化宽松政策下建立起来的债券资产负债表，因为如果市场出现紧张，央行拥有支撑市场的工具。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said the central bank should run down its balance sheet of bonds built up under quantitative easing more quickly because it has tools to shore up markets if strains emerged.】

item.title: 亲俄的斯洛伐克对被排除在欧盟 "无人机墙 "之外表示遗憾
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）不顾欧盟的一致意见，坚持与莫斯科保持联系，他的一位盟友对欧盟计划在其东翼建造不包括斯洛伐克或匈牙利在内的 "无人机墙 "进行了抨击。【原文：An ally of Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico, who has defied European Union consensus by maintaining ties with Moscow, lashed out at EU plans for a “drone wall” on its eastern flank that doesn’t include Slovakia or Hungary.】

item.title: 沃伦就阿根廷 "救市 "问题质询贝森特，米莱伊翘首以待
item.description: 马萨诸塞州参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）致信财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），希望获得更多有关特朗普政府可能 "救助 "阿根廷经济的信息。【原文：Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts wrote to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent seeking more information about the Trump administration’s potential “bailout” of Argentina’s economy.】

item.title: 肯尼亚耗资 11.5 亿美元的管道 IPO 比 17 年前 Safaricom 的规模还要大
item.description: 肯尼亚计划通过出售其石油管道公司的股票筹集多达 11.5 亿美元的资金，这可能是该国最大的首次公开募股，也是十年来的首次。【原文：Kenya plans to raise as much as $1.15 billion by selling shares in its petroleum pipeline company, potentially the nation’s biggest initial public offering and its first in a decade.】

item.title: 股票牛市让策略师们苦苦追赶
item.description:
华尔街对 S&P 500 指数的年终平均预测低于当前水平。【原文：

Wall Street’s average year-end forecast for the S&P 500 is below current levels.

】

item.title: 新兴市场货币下滑，印度卢比创历史新低
item.description: 在包括美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在内的美联储政策制定者发表讲话之前，美元汇率盘整，新兴市场货币指数连续第四天下滑。【原文：A gauge of emerging-market currencies slipped for a fourth day as the dollar consolidated ahead of speeches by Federal Reserve policy makers including Chair Jerome Powell which may give investors more clarity on the central bank’s policy path.】
